title: PerceptInsight
description: PerceptInsight is an event based analytics and engagement platform that generates insights and takes actions based on those insights, while preserving context. It comes with both predictive and prescriptive analytics powered by ML models under the hood. Set it up in less than 2 mins and see the power of PerceptInsight come to life as you now truly understand what your customers are doing and engage with them effectively. It's the companion that your rocket ship deserves!
